body_html:
Thanks you. I changed it
And I have a question. Why is it not possible to give the ksize of tf.nn.avg_pool or max_pool as a tensor? It makes no sense, that it has to be an int.
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/47740967/tf-avg-pool-with-dynamic-ksize

Sincerely Viktor

body:
Thanks you. I changed it
 And I have a question. Why is it not possible to give the ksize of tf.nn.avg_pool or max_pool as a tensor? It makes no sense, that it has to be an int.
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/47740967/tf-avg-pool-with-dynamic-ksize

Sincerely Viktor
